text: Rachel Anne Maddow (born April 1, 1973) is an American progressive female talk show host on the television network MSNBC, where she is the host of The Rachel Maddow Show. She is the first openly lesbian host of a primetime network news series. ==References== ==Other websites== * Rachel Maddow official site * Rachel Maddow Show on MSNBC * Rachel Maddow on Twitter Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American television news anchors Category:American television talk show hosts Category:American political commentators Category:Cable television personalities Category:American LGBT people Category:LGBT broadcasters
title: Rachel Maddow
